entities.name: black
entities.description: The Black family is mentioned as a noble and ancient house.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Black, and he is present in the scene.

entities.name: mrs black
entities.description: Mrs. Black is mentioned as being angry and screeching at Sirius.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is present in the scene and trying to listen to what's going on downstairs.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as being present in the room with Harry.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt's voice is recognized by Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the person who will receive a report from Kingsley.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody's cloak is being used by Hestia.

relationships.description: Sirius and Mrs. Black are arguing.
Harry is present in the room with Mrs. Weasley.
Kingsley Shacklebolt is reporting to Dumbledore.
Harry is concerned about what's going on downstairs and wants to listen.
Moody's cloak is being used by Hestia.
